main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified aerial objects reported in Dayton, Ohio, during the summer of 1958.
interesting points: Witnesses described the objects as having the appearance of shooting stars that changed brightness,Some witnesses reported a zig-zag movement and neither sound nor smoke was observed,There were several instances of both day and nighttime sightings,Two aircraft were reported to be in the vicinity during some observed events,Some witnesses linked their experiences to military aircraft activity.
sighted object: Unidentified aerial phenomena resembling shooting stars
witness description: Multiple witnesses observed the objects under different conditions and times.
